entry.title: Friday: Rain at times heavy. High 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain at times heavy beginning this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 late this afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:19 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Rain at times heavy or drizzle. Temperature rising to 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending before morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle or showers. Risk of a thundershower late this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southeast 60 gusting to 90 this evening. Temperature rising to 11 by morning. Forecast issued 08:19 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of drizzle. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of drizzle or showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:19 AM AST Friday 23 December 2022
